name: Dash OVERLORD
description:
DASH OVERLORD

Welcome to the deep parts of your mind! Here,  you will have to pass a few levels while trying NOT to die! Since you are the overlord of this place, you also get a neat DASH move to play around with. Isn't that sick?

Play the Newgrounds version here and unlock medals!

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/819901

CONTROLS

Move: WASD or the arrow keys

JUMP: W, SPACE, or the up arrow

DASH: SHIFT or Z

Source code? Here you go! :>

https://github.com/Bogdan2D/Dash-OVERLORD
